definition: goodbye (modest formula)/Excuse me, I must leave.
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: Oh. Excuse me. What are you doing here?
Because do not deserve, so choose.
sentences.chinese: 因为不配，所以选择失陪。

sentences.english: Excusing themselves, the two men went one floor down.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人说了一声“失陪”，便来到下一层。

sentences.english: Archibald: I'll go with you. Excuse us.
Now if you'll excuse me, swizzle stick, number 17 has a yacht and giant feet.
sentences.chinese: 恕我失陪，17号搅酒棒，有艘游艇和一双大脚。

sentences.english: Where did the time go? I'm going to excuse myself.
sentences.chinese: 时间过得真快，抱歉，我要失陪了。

sentences.english: Excuse me while I go slip into something less comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 失陪一下，我要换件不太舒服的衣服。

sentences.english: Please excuse me for a little while ,I want to do something.
Now if you'll excuse me, I have to get back to my gardening.
sentences.chinese: 那就好，恕我失陪，我得回去继续栽花修草了。

sentences.english: Now if you'll excuse me, I have to call Boner and break my best friends heart.
sentences.chinese: 我要失陪了，去给波拿打个电话，他会伤心的。

definition: Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to petition for retirement (old)/to ask for leave to withdraw/to ask to be excused
to say goodbye/to take one's leave
same as 慢慢吃[man4 man4 chi1]
to half rise out of one's chair (a polite gesture)
to do as one pleases/to not inconvenience oneself
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
